verses.verse: The <S%G976>book<s%> of the <S%G1078>generation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

<S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac;<s%> and <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob;<s%> and <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> and his <S%G80>brothers;<s%>

And <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G5329>Phares<s%> and <S%G2196>Zara<s%> of <S%G2283>Thamar;<s%> and <S%G5329>Phares<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2074>Esrom;<s%> and <S%G2074>Esrom<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G689>Aram;<s%>
And <S%G689>Aram<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G284>Aminadab;<s%> and <S%G284>Aminadab<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G3476>Naasson;<s%> and <S%G3476>Naasson<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G4533>Salmon;<s%>

And <S%G4533>Salmon<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G1003>Booz<s%> of <S%G4477>Rachab;<s%> and <S%G1003>Booz<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G5601>Obed<s%> of <S%G4503>Ruth;<s%> and <S%G5601>Obed<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2421>Jesse;<s%>

And <S%G2421>Jesse<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> the <S%G935>king;<s%> and <S%G1138>David<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G4672>Solomon<s%> of her that had been the wife of <S%G3774>Urias;<s%>
And <S%G4672>Solomon<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G4497>Roboam;<s%> and <S%G4497>Roboam<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G7>Abia;<s%> and <S%G7>Abia<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G760>Asa;<s%>
And <S%G760>Asa<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2498>Josaphat;<s%> and <S%G2498>Josaphat<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2496>Joram;<s%> and <S%G2496>Joram<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G3604>Ozias;<s%>
And <S%G3604>Ozias<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2488>Joatham;<s%> and <S%G2488>Joatham<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G881>Achaz;<s%> and <S%G881>Achaz<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G1478>Ezekias;<s%>
And <S%G1478>Ezekias<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G3128>Manasses;<s%> and <S%G3128>Manasses<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G300>Amon;<s%> and <S%G300>Amon<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2502>Josias;<s%>

And <S%G2502>Josias<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2423>Jechonias<s%> and his <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G1909>about<s%> the <S%G1909>time<s%> they were <S%G3350>carried<s%> <S%G3350>away<s%> to <S%G897>Babylon:<s%>

And <S%G3326>after<s%> they were <S%G3350>brought<s%> to <S%G897>Babylon,<s%> <S%G2423>Jechonias<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G4528>Salathiel;<s%> and <S%G4528>Salathiel<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2216>Zorobabel;<s%>
And <S%G2216>Zorobabel<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G10>Abiud;<s%> and <S%G10>Abiud<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G1662>Eliakim;<s%> and <S%G1662>Eliakim<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G107>Azor;<s%>
And <S%G107>Azor<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G4524>Sadoc;<s%> and <S%G4524>Sadoc<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G885>Achim;<s%> and <S%G885>Achim<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G1664>Eliud;<s%>
And <S%G1664>Eliud<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G1648>Eleazar;<s%> and <S%G1648>Eleazar<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G3157>Matthan;<s%> and <S%G3157>Matthan<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob;<s%>

And <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> of <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G3767>So<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1074>generations<s%> from <S%G11>Abraham<s%> to <S%G1138>David<s%> are <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G1074>generations;<s%> and from <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G3350>carrying<s%> <S%G3350>away<s%> <S%G3350>into<s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%> are <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G1074>generations;<s%> and from the <S%G3350>carrying<s%> <S%G3350>away<s%> <S%G3350>into<s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%> to <S%G5547>Christ<s%> are <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G1074>generations.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G1083>birth<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> was on <S%G3779>this<s%> wise: When as his <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> was <S%G3423>espoused<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> <S%G4250>before<s%> <S%G2228><s%> they <S%G4905>came<s%> <S%G4905>together,<s%> she was <S%G2147>found<s%> with <S%G1722>child<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> her <S%G435>husband,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> a <S%G1342>just<s%> man, and not <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G3856>make<s%> her a <S%G3856>public<s%> <S%G3856>example,<s%> was <S%G1014>minded<s%> to <S%G630>put<s%> her <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G2977>privately.<s%>

But while he <S%G1760>thought<s%> <S%G1760>on<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>LORD<s%> <S%G5316>appeared<s%> to him in a <S%G3677>dream,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> you <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> <S%G5399>fear<s%> not to <S%G3880>take<s%> to you <S%G3137>Mary<s%> your <S%G1135>wife:<s%> for that which is <S%G1080>conceived<s%> in her is of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>

And she shall <S%G5088>bring<s%> <S%G5088>forth<s%> a <S%G5207>son,<s%> and you shall <S%G2564>call<s%> his <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G2424>JESUS:<s%> for he shall <S%G4982>save<s%> his <S%G2992>people<s%> from their <S%G266>sins.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> was <S%G1096>done,<s%> that it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> by the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> a <S%G3933>virgin<s%> shall be with <S%G1722>child,<s%> <S%G1064><s%> <S%G2192><s%> and shall <S%G5088>bring<s%> <S%G5088>forth<s%> a <S%G5207>son,<s%> and they <S%G2564>shall<s%> call his <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1694>Emmanuel,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> being <S%G3177>interpreted<s%> is, <S%G2316>God<s%> with us.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> being <S%G1326>raised<s%> from <S%G5258>sleep<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> as the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> had <S%G4367>bidden<s%> him, and <S%G3880>took<s%> to him his <S%G1135>wife:<s%>

And <S%G1097>knew<s%> her not <S%G2193>till<s%> she had <S%G5088>brought<s%> <S%G5088>forth<s%> her <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> <S%G5207>son:<s%> and he <S%G2564>called<s%> his <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G2424>JESUS.<s%>
